Articles.Content: This modified settings.cfg file changes the ocean generation back to the way it was in version 0.13, I am posting it to help people who want more FPS or if they have older computers
Thanks! this actually makes it run faster than 0.14! 8)
Glad to help, I didn\'t make it though, Someone linked it to me, So I linked it to you guys, Whoever made it really deserves the credit.
